summary: REQ-2 appears implemented via updates to publish-live documentation and publish-live.sh console messaging to reference Version 25 and keep the target domain radicaleconomist101-h78.caffeine.xyz. REQ-1 is partially supported by publish-live.sh running the preflight script and deploying the frontend canister, but the diff does not provide evidence that the Live UI will indicate the environment is Live after publish. The diff also includes unrelated project bookkeeping updates and a broad set of UI/app feature descriptions not requested for a publish-only task.

missing_requirements.requirement: Visiting https://radicaleconomist101-h78.caffeine.xyz loads the latest build and the UI indicates the environment is Live.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows deployment scripts and documentation updates, but does not show any concrete frontend code/config change ensuring the deployed Live site will indicate 'Live' in the UI (only a script note telling the operator to verify this).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/expanded application UI/features (e.g., new routes like /purchase-confirmation/$orderId, admin dashboard settings tab for store reset, enhanced library content dialog with media handling, hero asset changes, etc.), which are unrelated to publishing Version 25 to Live.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists non-goals as implementing new application features or UI changes unrelated to publishing; the diff summary text describes many such additions/changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state metadata changes (project_state.json) marking publish work items and summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request adding/updating internal project tracking files; it only requested running preflight/publish and updating publish docs/script messaging.
